com.easemob.chat
类 EMChatDB

java.lang.Object
  com.easemob.chat.EMChatDB
已过时。 This class will soon be removed, please stop using this class and you can find related functions in EMChatManager 

public class EMChatDB
extends java.lang.Object

EMChatDB 负责管理消息数据库，对外提供查询接口 

 EMChatDB.getInstance().deleteMessage(message_id);

版本：
2.0
